name: Xintra
description:
Notice: This is the Demo Version, not the Full Game which is under development!

"In Xintra, players will embark on an epic journey through time to save the Kingdom of the Mighty Elves from certain doom. The Kingdom is under attack by a ruthless horde of Savages, and it's up to the player to defend it using their wit, magic, and a wide array of weapons such as swords, axes, fireballs, and more. This action-packed RPG game immerses players in a rich fantasy world filled with danger, adventure, and magic. With an intuitive combat system and a wide variety of weapons and spells to master, players must use all their skills to defend the kingdom and defeat the enemy. Join the Xintra Batlle, and become the hero the Kingdom needs to survive."

The DEMO version is free to play but your donations for building the full game will be greatly appreciated. Thanks for your support.

NOTE: Install the Itch.io app if you don't already have it and run the game from there.  Updates/Patches will be much smaller and faster to download if you use the desktop App.   Get the app here:  https://itch.io/app
